statements: SELECT * FROM replication_strategies ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT id, strategy_name FROM replication_strategies WHERE data_replication = TRUE
SELECT strategy_name, high_availability FROM replication_strategies WHERE high_availability = FALSE
SELECT * FROM replication_strategies WHERE id = 3
SELECT id, strategy_name FROM replication_strategies
SELECT id, strategy_name FROM replication_strategies WHERE data_replication = TRUE;
SELECT strategy_name, high_availability FROM replication_strategies WHERE id > 2 ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM replication_strategies WHERE high_availability = TRUE AND data_replication = FALSE;
SELECT id, strategy_name, data_replication FROM replication_strategies WHERE id BETWEEN 1 AND 3;
SELECT id, strategy_name, high_availability FROM replication_strategies WHERE strategy_name LIKE '%replication%' ORDER BY strategy_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM users WHERE country='USA';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM orders;
SELECT product_name, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM order_details GROUP BY product_name;
SELECT category, AVG(price) AS avg_price FROM products GROUP BY category ORDER BY avg_price DESC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY last_name ASC, first_name DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM users WHERE department IN ('Engineering', 'Marketing') AND status = 'active';
SELECT MAX(salary) AS max_salary, MIN(salary) AS min_salary, AVG(salary) AS avg_salary FROM employees GROUP BY department HAVING COUNT(*) > 5;
SELECT product_id, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity, AVG(price) AS avg_price FROM sales GROUP BY product_id HAVING SUM(quantity) > 100;
SELECT DISTINCT country FROM customers WHERE joined_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM replication_strategies
SELECT strategy_id, strategy_name FROM replication_strategies ORDER BY strategy_name DESC
SELECT description FROM replication_strategies WHERE strategy_id = 1
SELECT replication_type, replication_date FROM data_replication ORDER BY replication_date ASC
SELECT ha_type, ha_provider, ha_configuration FROM high_availability
SELECT * FROM replication_strategies WHERE strategy_id = 1;
SELECT strategy_name FROM replication_strategies WHERE strategy_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM data_replication WHERE replication_type = 'full';
SELECT replication_id, replication_type, replication_status FROM data_replication WHERE replication_status = 'completed' ORDER BY replication_date DESC;
SELECT ha_type, ha_provider FROM high_availability WHERE ha_type LIKE '%cluster%' ORDER BY ha_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM DataReplication;
SELECT id, replication_technique FROM DataReplication;
SELECT provider_name, provider_region FROM CloudProvider;
SELECT id, ha_technology, ha_strategy FROM HighAvailability;
SELECT instance_type, instance_status FROM CloudInstance;
SELECT * FROM DataReplication;
SELECT id, replication_factor, replication_technique FROM DataReplication ORDER BY replication_factor DESC;
SELECT id, provider_name FROM CloudProvider WHERE provider_region = 'us-east-1';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_instances FROM CloudInstance WHERE instance_status = 'running';
SELECT cr.provider_name, ci.instance_type FROM CloudProvider cr JOIN CloudInstance ci ON cr.id = ci.id;
SELECT * FROM replication_strategies;
SELECT strategy_name, description FROM replication_strategies ORDER BY strategy_name ASC;
SELECT id, strategy_name FROM replication_strategies WHERE id = 1;
SELECT policy_name, min_replication_factor FROM high_availability_policies WHERE min_replication_factor > 2;
SELECT * FROM replication_metrics WHERE metric_value > 100.00;
SELECT * FROM replication_strategies
SELECT id, strategy_name FROM replication_strategies ORDER BY strategy_name DESC
SELECT policy_name, min_replication_factor FROM high_availability_policies WHERE min_replication_factor > 1
SELECT * FROM replication_runs WHERE replication_status = 'SUCCESS'
SELECT log_timestamp, log_message FROM replication_logs ORDER BY log_timestamp ASC
